section.heading: Signing and filing pursuant to judicial order.

para.text: If a person required by this chapter to sign a record or deliver a record to the Mayor for filing under this chapter does not do so, any other person that is aggrieved may petition the Superior Court to order:
The person to sign the record;
The person to deliver the record to the Mayor for filing; or
The Mayor to file the record unsigned.

If a petitioner under subsection (a) of this section is not the partnership or foreign limited liability partnership to which the record pertains, the petitioner shall make the partnership a party to the action.
A record filed under subsection (a)(3) of this section is effective without being signed.

annotations.annotation: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
This section is referenced in § 29-601.04 and § 29-601.11.
